title: Drawing, "Sheet of a drawing book: two pitchers and bowl", 1625–75
medium: Black chalk, pen and black ink on paper
markings: Stamp in purple ink, lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union (Lugt 457c)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The three vessels form a group.  A pitcher with a handle, composed of two snakes, stands in front and partially covers the others.  Both pitchers face left. The bowl is low. Parts of the design are lightly sketched.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sheet of a drawing book: two pitchers and bowl", 1625–75.
1625–75. Black chalk, pen and black ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2910.
